Articles.Content: Well,I would like to thank you for the patch! I now currently encounter more issues than before it's release.At this point I would love nothing more than an apology,refund and agreement that this game as much as I love it is unfit for consoles.I do love it but it's performance is completely unacceptable.

At least you can start it. I have just PS4 (not pro). And after the last update the game crashes to the dashboard before it even starts loading to the main menu.

The purpose of the hole certification process remains mystery...
